title: Carson Block: Most firms that went public via SPAC 'should be deemed uninvestable' - Yahoo Finance
content: Carson Block: Most firms that went public via SPAC 'should be deemed uninvestable'  Yahoo Finance
description: Famed short-seller Carson Block raised the alarm on special purpose acquisition companies (SPAC) at the height of their activity, building his bets while warning retail investors about “a scam” in the market.
